name: playwright-javascript
description: This is Test Automation framework designed using Playwright, and JavaScript

scripts.single-test-file: npm run clean && playwright test cart.spec.js --reporter=line
scripts.test-line-reporter: npm run clean && playwright test -c e2e.config.js --reporter=line
scripts.e2e: npm run clean && playwright test -c e2e.config.js --reporter=line,./my-awesome-reporter.js,allure-playwright
